pages.text: 26|160|luttutaiya makkalum (nam) tutarkalaip poyyakkinarkal
26|161|avarkalutaiya cakotarar lut avarkalai nokki ‘‘ninkal (pavattiliruntu vilaki) allahvai ancikkolla ventama
26|162|niccayamaka nan unkalitam anuppappatta nampikkaiyana oru tutanaka irukkiren
26|163|(akave) allahvukkup payantu enakku kilppatiyunkal
26|164|itarkaka nan unkalitattil oru kuliyaiyum ketkavillai. En kuli ulakattarin iraivanitame tavira (veruyaritamum) illai
26|165|ninkal (unkal kama iccaiyait tanittuk kolla) ulakattarkalil ankalitame celkirirkal
26|166|Unkal iraivan unkalukkakap pataitta unkal manaivikalai ninkal purakkanittu vitukirirkale! Ninkal (allahvin iyarkai muraiyai) mirivitta makkal avirkal'' enru kurinar
26|167|atarkavarkal ‘‘lutte! (Ivvaru kuruvatai vittu) nir vilakik kollavitil niccayamaka nir (nam urai vittut) turattappatuvir'' enru kurinarkal
26|168|atarkavar ‘‘niccayamaka nan unkal (ittiya) ceyalai verukkiren'' enru kuri
26|169|‘‘en iraivane! Ivarkalin (tiya) ceyaliliruntu ennaiyum, en kutumpattaiyum patukattuk kolvayaka'' (enru pirarttittar)
26|170|akave, avaraiyum avar kutumpattinar anaivaraiyum nam patukattuk kontom
26|171|eninum, (avarutaiya) oru kila (manai)viyait tavira aval (luttutan) varatu pin tankiyavarkalutan tanki (alintu) vittal
26|172|pinnar, nam marra anaivaraiyum alittu vittom
26|173|avarkal mitu nam (kal) malaiyai poliyac ceytom. Accamutti eccarikkai ceyyappatta(a)varkalin (mitu polinta kal) malai maka kettatu
26|174|niccayamaka itilor nalla attatciyiruntatu. Eninum, avarkalil perumpalana varkal nampikkai kollavillai
26|175|(napiye!) Niccayamaka umatu iraivantan mikaittavan, maka karunaiyutaiyavan
26|176|(‘matyan' ennum uril) colaiyil vacittiruntavarkalum (nam) tutarkalaip poyyakkinarkal
26|177|su'aip (napi) avarkalai nokki ‘‘ninkal (allahvukku anci pavattiliruntu) vilakik kolla ventama
26|178|niccayamaka nan unkalitam anuppappatta nampikkaiyulla oru tutanaka irukkiren
26|179|akave, allahvai anci enakku kilppatiyunkal
26|180|itarkaka nan unkalitam oru kuliyum ketkavillai. En kuli ulakattarkalin iraivanitame tavira (verevaritamum) illai.”
26|181|Alavaiyai mulumaiyaka alantu kotunkal. Ninkal (makkalukku) nastamilaippavarkalaka irukka ventam
26|182|cariyana taracil niruttuk kotunkal
26|183|manitarkalukku niruttuk kotukka ventiya avarkalutaiya porulkalai ninkal kuraittu vitatirkal. Ninkal pumiyil katumaiyaka visamam (-kalakam) ceytu kontu alaiyatirkal
